com.fwdekker.randomness.common

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fwdekker.randomness.common.Validator

  • public final class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for validating JComponents.

    A validation method does nothing if the component is valid, and throws a ValidationException if the component is invalid.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • areValidRange

        public static void areValidRange(javax.swing.JSpinner min,
                                 javax.swing.JSpinner max,
                                 double size)
                          throws ValidationException
        Throws a ValidationException if the difference between the values of min and max is infinity or if it is greater than size.

        The thrown exception's component is max.

        Parameters:
        min - the spinner that forms the start of the range
        max - the spinner that forms the end of the range
        size - the maximum difference between the spinners' values
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if min's value is greater than that of max

      • isGreaterThan

        public static void isGreaterThan(javax.swing.JSpinner spinner,
                                 double value)
                          throws ValidationException
        Throws a ValidationException if the spinner's value is less than or equal to the given value.
        Parameters:
        spinner - a spinner
        value - the value the spinner should be greater than
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the spinner's value is less than or equal to the given value

      • isGreaterThanOrEqualTo

        public static void isGreaterThanOrEqualTo(javax.swing.JSpinner spinner,
                                          double value)
                                   throws ValidationException
        Throws a ValidationException if the spinner's value is less than the given value.
        Parameters:
        spinner - a spinner
        value - the value the spinner should not be greater than
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the spinner's value is less than the given value
